title: 6-096iap2011.jpg
description: An xkcd comic about pointers. (Courtesy of Randall Munroe.)

image_metadata.caption: One of the defining features of C++ is that it makes heavy use of pointers, variables which store the numerical memory addresses of pieces of other data. (Courtesy of Randall Munroe. Original comic [can be found here](http://xkcd.com/138/).)
